QueryViewSpec.Name: Newsletter Update Only Financial Sponsors (Gifters) Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Financial sponsors who have a gifted sponsorship with a different address than Correspondent and the child who do not have an Annual Photo Update interaction.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select financialsponsor.ID as ID, financialsponsor.LOOKUPID as FINANCIALSPONSORLOOKUPID, financialsponsor.NAME as FINANCIALSPONSORNAME, so.ID as CHILDID, proj_const.LOOKUPID as PROJECTLOOKUPID, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME as CHILDNAME
from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so_child.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = slocation.ID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT proj_const on proj_const.ID = slocation.FIELDOFFICEID inner join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on rs.ID = s.REVENUESPLITID inner join dbo.REVENUE r on r.ID = rs.REVENUEID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT financialsponsor on financialsponsor.ID = r.CONSTITUENTID inner join dbo.ADDRESS fs_address on fs_address.CONSTITUENTID = financialsponsor.ID and fs_address.ISPRIMARY = 1 inner join dbo.ADDRESS c_address on c_address.CONSTITUENTID = s.CONSTITUENTID and c_address.ISPRIMARY = 1
where s.CONSTITUENTID <> r.CONSTITUENTID and s.STATUSCODE = 1 and not exists (select i.ID from dbo.INTERACTION i join dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY isubcat on i.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = isubcat.ID join dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY icat on isubcat.INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = icat.ID where i.CONSTITUENTID = so_child.CONSTITUENTID and isubcat.NAME = 'Annual Photo Update' and icat.NAME = 'Child Annual Update' and i.EXPECTEDDATE >= '3/31/2013' ) and (dbo.USR_UFN_ADDRESS_ADDRESSBLOCK_NORMALIZE_LOWERCASE(fs_address.ADDRESSBLOCK)<> dbo.USR_UFN_ADDRESS_ADDRESSBLOCK_NORMALIZE_LOWERCASE(c_address.ADDRESSBLOCK) or coalesce (fs_address.STATEID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') <> coalesce (c_address.STATEID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'))
